items.sentence: I guess I always knew there was a chance that Tom wouldn\'t come.
Tom knew he barely had enough money to buy what he needed to buy.
I wonder if Tom has ever told Mary about what we did on that day.
Tom said he didn\'t have time to read the newspaper this morning.
Tom doesn\'t know whether he can do it, but he\'ll give it a try.
It\'s very obvious that Tom doesn\'t understand French very well.
It\'s the equivalent of sawing off the branch you\'re sitting on.
I\'m trying to think of some ideas for this article I\'m writing.
I\'ve been staying at my younger brother\'s house on Park Street.
Tom couldn\'t believe that he\'d ever be able to play the guitar.
